title: Someone changed my password somehow
body: I was playing in my account yesterday at 11 pm. Now i cant open my account. It says wrong password and username combination. I tried to change my password but i don't remember my email that i used for this account. I checked every possible emails i have but i cant find it. Can someone help me?

replies.body: No worries, we can help!  I've locked your account as security precaution so no unauthorized parties can access it.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account team can help with recovery as well as updating your info.   We got your back, and you'll hear from us through your ticket as soon as possible!
